name: convert-matrix4-to-workbench-sparse
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
CONVERT A 3-FILE MATRIX4 TO A WORKBENCH SPARSE FILE.

Converts the matrix 4 output of probtrackx to workbench sparse file format.  Exactly one of -surface-seeds and -volume-seeds must be specified.

inputs.name: orientation_file
inputs.description: the .fiberTEMP.nii file this trajectory file applies to

inputs.name: voxel_list
inputs.description: list of white matter voxel index triplets as used in the trajectory matrix

inputs.name: wb_sparse_out
inputs.description: output - the output workbench sparse file

inputs.name: opt_surface_seeds_seed_roi
inputs.description: specify the surface seed space: metric roi file of all vertices used in the seed space
